item.title: 美国海军对与中国加强沟通的前景感到“兴奋”，但表示还需要做更多工作
item.description:
The U.S. Navy was "excited" by the prospect of improved operational communications with the Chinese military amid roiling regional tensions, but work was still needed to solidify the next steps, a senior U.S. naval officer said on Friday.翻译:一名美国海军高级军官周五表示，在地区紧张局势不断加剧的情况下，美国海军对与中国军方改善作战沟通的前景感到“兴奋”，但仍需要努力巩固下一步措施。

Admiral Lisa Franchetti, U.S. Chief of Naval Operations, told a media briefing during a visit to Seoul that it was vital to maintain open lines of communications between the two militaries to avoid "misunderstandings and miscalculations" that could lead to conflict.翻译:美国海军作战部长丽莎·弗朗凯蒂上将在访问首尔期间在媒体吹风会上表示，保持两军之间开放的沟通渠道至关重要，以避免可能导致冲突的“误解和误判”。

"I'm very excited and I welcome that announcement," she said of China's agreement to resume telephone communications between theatre commands, something U.S. officials have been eager to develop.翻译:“我非常兴奋，我欢迎这一消息，”她在谈到中国​​同意恢复战区司令部之间的电话通信时说道，这是美国官员一直渴望发展的。

"These agreements were reached just recently, and we know that we have work with the PRC military to do to solidify the next steps," Franchetti said on her first visit to the region since starting the job on Nov. 2.翻译:弗朗凯蒂在 11 月 2 日开始工作以来首次访问该地区时表示：“这些协议是最近才达成的，我们知道我们需要与中华人民共和国军方合作，以巩固接下来的步骤。”

Her remarks come after agreements this month by U.S. President Joe Biden and China's Xi Jinping to resume military contacts that Beijing froze after then-House of Representatives Speaker Nancy Pelosi visited Taiwan in August 2022.翻译:她发表此番言论之前，美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平本月达成协议，恢复军事接触，而在时任众议院议长南希·佩洛西于 2022 年 8 月访问台湾后，北京方面冻结了军事接触。

The need for improved military communications was part of four hours of discussions when the two leaders meet in San Francisco last week, talks that covered tensions over Taiwan, Iran and co-operation over reducing the flow to the opioid fentanyl to the United States.翻译:上周两位领导人在旧金山会面时，进行了四个小时的讨论，其中包括改善军事沟通的必要性，会谈内容涵盖了台湾、伊朗问题上的紧张局势，以及减少流向美国的阿片类芬太尼方面的合作。

The U.S. and some regional militaries have complained about near misses and unsafe interactions with Chinese aircraft and ships in the disputed South China Sea and across East Asia, leading to fears that tensions could spiral into conflict.翻译:美国和一些地区军队抱怨称，在有争议的南海和整个东亚地区，与中国飞机和舰船的险些发生和不安全的互动，引发了人们对紧张局势可能升级为冲突的担忧。

"We expect all navies in international waters to uphold the rules and norms of proper military behaviour on, under and above the sea," she said.翻译:她说：“我们希望国际水域的所有海军都遵守海上、水下和海上适当军事行为的规则和规范。”

Asked repeatedly about Chinese military advances, particularly in its submarines and undersea surveillance operations, Franchetti said she was confident of U.S. naval dominance even as China "continues to develop its capabilities in the maritime domain and in all other domains".翻译:当被反复问及中国的军事进步，特别是潜艇和水下监视行动方面的进步时，弗朗凯蒂表示，尽管中国“继续发展其在海洋领域和所有其他领域的能力”，但她对美国海军的主导地位充满信心。

The U.S. would continue to operate closely with allies and partners "which is our strategic advantage and something China simply doesn't have."翻译:美国将继续与盟友和伙伴密切合作，“这是我们的战略优势，而中国根本不具备”。

Through tighter integration, planning and exercises with its network of allies and partners, she said the U.S. will "continue to deter China and other potential adversaries around the world".翻译:她表示，通过与其盟友和合作伙伴网络进行更紧密的整合、规划和演习，美国将“继续威慑中国和世界各地的其他潜在对手”。

Reporting by Greg Torode; Writing by Liz Lee; Editing by Jamie Freed and Gerry Doyle翻译:格雷格·托罗德报道；莉兹·李撰写；杰米·弗里德和格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: 电动汽车调查后法国外长访华缓和关系
item.description:
French Foreign Minister Catherine Colonna is set to meet the Chinese leadership in Beijing on Friday as she seeks to soothe ties after the launch of a European Union anti-subsidy probe backed by Paris into Chinese-made electric vehicles.翻译:法国外交部长凯瑟琳·科隆纳将于周五在北京会见中国领导人，在巴黎支持的欧盟对中国制造的电动汽车发起反补贴调查后，她寻求缓和关系。

Colonna's visit to the Chinese capital, centred around a dialogue with her counterpart Wang Yi on people-to-people exchanges, is likely to be overshadowed by trade issues in the wake of the EV investigation, which Beijing has blasted as "protectionist".翻译:科隆纳对中国首都的访问主要是与王毅就人文交流进行对话，但此次调查可能会因电动汽车调查后的贸易问题而蒙上阴影，北京方面将调查斥为“保护主义”。

It also comes shortly before a visit by the European Commission and Council presidents, Ursula von der Leyen and Charles Michel, to Beijing in early December for the first in-person summit with President Xi Jinping in four years, after China-EU relations nosedived during the pandemic.翻译:就在欧盟委员会和理事会主席乌尔苏拉·冯德莱恩和查尔斯·米歇尔于 12 月初访问北京，与习近平主席进行四年来首次面对面峰会之前不久，此前中欧关系在大流行。

French President Emmanuel Macron has argued the EU should stop being naive and demand a level playing field with countries like China, and had been pushing the European Commission behind the scenes to launch the probe.翻译:法国总统马克龙表示，欧盟不应再天真，要求与中国等国家建立公平的竞争环境，并一直在幕后推动欧盟委员会启动调查。

"The minister will speak of the desire of the EU to further assert its sovereignty in economic matters and to ensure that exchanges with China are more balanced," said a French diplomatic source on condition of anonymity.翻译:一位不愿透露姓名的法国外交消息人士表示：“部长将谈到欧盟希望进一步维护其在经济事务上的主权，并确保与中国的交流更加平衡。”

The source added that France supports the European Commission probe "without naivety".翻译:消息人士补充说，法国“并不天真”地支持欧盟委员会的调查。

China is France's third-largest trade partner, but French and other European firms are deeply concerned about China's vast trade imbalance with the EU, its opaque legislation on cross-border data transfers and cheap Chinese EVs flooding the European market, threatening domestic carmakers.翻译:中国是法国第三大贸易伙伴，但法国和其他欧洲企业对中国与欧盟巨大的贸易不平衡、跨境数据传输立法不透明以及廉价的中国电动汽车充斥欧洲市场、威胁国内汽车制造商深感担忧。

France is also concerned about Chinese attempts to force French cosmetics companies to share manufacturing secrets with Chinese parties.翻译:法国还对中国试图迫使法国化妆品公司与中方分享制造秘密感到担忧。

Xi insisted that China welcomes investment from French firms in a telephone call on Monday with Macron, who urged fair treatment for foreign companies in China.翻译:习近平在周一与马克龙的电话中坚称中国欢迎法国企业投资，马克龙敦促公平对待在华外国企业。

European officials have repeatedly vowed to reduce economic dependencies on China in critical sectors - otherwise known as "de-risking" - in the face of what the G7 calls China's "economic coercion".翻译:面对七国集团所谓的中国“经济胁迫”，欧洲官员一再发誓要减少关键领域对中国的经济依赖，也称为“去风险”。

France is China's top source of cosmetics and wine imports, according to China's customs agency, with French luxury titans such as LMVH (LVMH.PA) particularly dependent on Chinese consumers. The lack of a strong rebound in luxury demand following China's post-pandemic re-opening has also spooked investors.翻译:据中国海关称，法国是中国最大的化妆品和葡萄酒进口来源地，LMVH (LVMH.PA)等法国奢侈品巨头尤其依赖中国消费者。中国疫情后重新开放后奢侈品需求缺乏强劲反弹也令投资者感到恐慌。

Colonna will also discuss the Ukraine war with her Chinese counterparts and urge Beijing to use its influence on Iran to stop the Gaza crisis from escalating further, the French diplomatic source added. North Korea, which recently claimed it launched its first spy satellite, will be another key topic of discussion.翻译:法国外交消息人士补充说，科隆纳还将与中国同行讨论乌克兰战争，并敦促北京利用其对伊朗的影响力来阻止加沙危机进一步升级。朝鲜最近声称发射了第一颗间谍卫星，这将成为讨论的另一个关键话题。

Macron visited China in April with great fanfare, in an attempt to demonstrate France's strategic autonomy from the United States.翻译:马克龙今年4月大张旗鼓地访华，试图展示法国对美国的战略自主权。

Reporting by Laurie Chen and John Irish; Editing by Raju Gopalakrishnan翻译:Laurie Chen 和 John Irish 的报道；编辑：拉朱·戈帕拉克里希南

item.title: 中韩日外长讨论三边峰会
item.description:
The foreign ministers of South Korea, China and Japan will meet for talks in South Korea on Sunday, South Korea's foreign ministry said on Friday, as the three countries seek to hold their first leaders' summit in four years.翻译:韩国外交部周五表示，韩国、中国和日本外长将于周日在韩国举行会谈，这三个国家寻求举行四年来的首次领导人峰会。

The neighbours had agreed to hold a summit every year starting in 2008 to foster regional cooperation, but the plan has been dogged by bilateral feuds and the COVID-19 pandemic. Their last summit was in 2019.翻译:邻国同意从 2008 年开始每年举行一次峰会，以促进区域合作，但该计划一直受到双边不和和新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行的困扰。他们上次峰会是在 2019 年。

The meeting of foreign ministers, which will take place in the South Korean port city of Busan, is also the first such meeting since 2019. In September, senior diplomats from the three countries agreed to arrange a meeting of their leaders at the "earliest convenient time."翻译:将于韩国港口城市釜山举行的外长会议也是自 2019 年以来的首次此类会议。9 月，这三个国家的高级外交官同意安排领导人在“最早方便的时间”举行会晤。时间。”

"The foreign ministers plan to exchange views extensively on the direction of development of trilateral cooperation including preparations for a ninth trilateral summit, and regional and global issues," the South Korean foreign ministry said in a statement.翻译:韩国外交部在一份声明中表示，“外长们计划就三边合作的发展方向广泛交换意见，包括第九次三边峰会的筹备工作以及地区和全球问题。”

The ministers will also hold bilateral meetings on the sidelines, it added.翻译:声明补充说，部长们还将在场外举行双边会议。

The talks come as South Korea and Japan have seen improving ties and also deepening security cooperation with the United States amid concerns over China's growing regional influence.翻译:此次会谈正值韩国和日本改善关系并深化与美国的安全合作之际，两国对中国日益增长的地区影响力感到担忧。

Beijing has previously warned that U.S. efforts to strengthen ties with South Korea and Japan could increase tension and confrontation in the region.翻译:北京此前曾警告称，美国加强与韩国和日本关系的努力可能会加剧该地区的紧张局势和对抗。

The meeting in Busan also comes after North Korea said this week it had placed its first spy satellite in orbit, drawing international condemnation for violating U.N. resolutions that bar its use of technology applicable to ballistic missile programs.翻译:在釜山举行会议之前，朝鲜本周表示已将第一颗间谍卫星送入轨道，此举因违反禁止其使用适用于弹道导弹计划的技术的联合国决议而受到国际谴责。

Reporting by Ju-min Park and Hyonhee Shin; Editing by Ed Davies and Raju Gopalakrishnan翻译:Ju-min Park 和 Hyonhee Shin 的报道；编辑：Ed Davies 和 Raju Gopalakrishnan

item.title: 追逐不一样的中国梦，年轻的数字游民走向山野
item.description:
In this mountain town in China's southwest, drifters and tarot card readers rub shoulders with tech entrepreneurs and artists. Many are former city-dwellers in search of an elusive prize in authoritarian China: Space for open discussion and exchange of ideas.翻译:在中国西南部的这座山城里，漂泊者和塔罗牌占卜师与科技企业家和艺术家擦肩而过。许多人都是前城市居民，在专制中国寻找难以捉摸的奖品：公开讨论和交流思想的空间。

In one co-working space, a group of young adults asked questions about the effect of Trump-era populism on U.S. media during a discussion led by a Chinese journalist about the American position on the Israel-Gaza conflict. In a nearby cafe, others discussed art, sexual harassment and the listlessness of China's youth.翻译:在一个联合办公空间里，一群年轻人在一名中国记者主持的讨论中询问了特朗普时代民粹主义对美国媒体的影响，讨论了美国对以色列-加沙冲突的立场。在附近的一家咖啡馆里，其他人讨论了艺术、性骚扰和中国年轻人的无精打采。

As President Xi Jinping tightens his grip on the restricted personal freedoms of Chinese citizens and the economy stutters, exacerbating a youth unemployment crisis, Dali in Yunnan province has become a haven for those seeking to escape the pressure.翻译:随着习近平主席加强对中国公民个人自由的限制，经济陷入停滞，加剧了青年失业危机，云南省大理已成为那些寻求逃避压力的人的避风港。

They are drawn by the cheap rents, mild climate, stunning scenery and a history of relative tolerance, which were popularised by a television drama this year about a digital nomad.翻译:他们被廉价的租金、温和的气候、迷人的风景和相对宽容的历史所吸引，这些都因今年一部关于数字游牧民族的电视剧而流行。

Dali's Old Town district, administratively part of a city of 650,000, has attracted culture workers since the late 1990s, said Minhua Ling, an expert on Chinese migration at the Geneva Graduate Institute, adding that the normalisation of remote work and Dali's less restrictive policies during China's zero-COVID crackdown also increased its appeal.翻译:日内瓦研究生院中国移民问题专家凌敏华表示，大理老城区是这座拥有 65 万人口的城市的行政一部分，自 20 世纪 90 年代末以来一直吸引着文化工作者。中国的零新冠打击也增加了其吸引力。

In November, searches for "Dali" on WeChat were up 7% from a year ago, having surged some 290% on one day in late July, when many Chinese were booking summer trips.翻译:11 月份，微信上“大理”的搜索量比一年前增长了 7%，7 月底的一天飙升了约 290%，当时许多中国人都在预订夏季旅行。

Reuters interviewed 13 Chinese migrants to Dali, who described a refuge on the fringes of mainstream society, but also one that implicitly challenges Xi's "China Dream" of a prosperous nation ideologically loyal to the Communist Party. Many of them spoke on condition of anonymity for fear of government retaliation.翻译:路透社采访了13名前往大理的中国移民，他们描述了这是一个位于主流社会边缘的避难所，但也暗中挑战了习近平的“中国梦”，即一个在意识形态上忠于共产党的繁荣国家。由于担心政府报复，他们中的许多人都要求匿名。

"When younger generations are materially sufficient but spiritually lost, of course they will seek personal growth and freedom," said Bai Yunxi, a Dali-based 33-year-old civil servant-turned-astrologer.翻译:“当年轻一代物质充足但精神失落时，他们当然会寻求个人成长和自由，”大理33岁的公务员出身的占星师白云熙说。

Six of the people expressed concern about increased police scrutiny of their activities, citing abrupt cancellations of large-scale events and police raids.翻译:其中六人对警方加强对其活动的审查表示担忧，理由是大型活动突然取消和警方突击搜查。

Dali city's propaganda bureau did not respond to a faxed request for comment on the crackdowns and Dali's efforts to attract young skilled workers.

'IDEAL KINGDOM'

With youth unemployment at a record high this summer - when China stopped releasing the statistic - and a stagnant rural population due to low fertility rates and urban migration, Beijing has tried to enlist young people in "rural revitalisation".翻译:今年夏天，青年失业率创历史新高（当时中国停止发布统计数据），而农村人口由于低生育率和城市人口迁移而停滞不前，北京试图让年轻人参与“乡村振兴”。

Xi has urged graduates to "return to their hometowns" and "actively seek hardships", alluding to his experience during the Cultural Revolution. But the message does not appear to resonate with urban youths who grew up with expectations of prosperity but now find social mobility hard to attain.翻译:习近平引用了他在文革期间的经历，敦促毕业生“回到家乡”并“积极吃苦”。但这一信息似乎并没有引起城市年轻人的共鸣，他们在繁荣的期望中长大，但现在发现社会流动性很难实现。

Dali, where several of the people interviewed by Reuters said they found an escape from the conservative social values of rural China, is an exception to the flight of youth to large cities that has occurred since China's economic modernisation.翻译:路透社采访的几位人士表示，大理是中国经济现代化以来年轻人涌向大城市的一个例外，他们在那里找到了逃离中国农村保守社会价值观的地方。

Bai moved to Dali in September, quitting her government job to give online astrology readings. She shares a three-storey house with her partner, a friend and three cats. "My living situation provides enough space to develop my career and personal life without interference from others," she said.翻译:白九月辞去政府工作搬到大理，开始进行在线占星术解读。她与伴侣、一位朋友和三只猫合住一栋三层楼的房子。 “我的生活状况为我发展事业和个人生活提供了足够的空间，不受他人干扰，”她说。

She also referenced Dali's nickname, "Ideal Kingdom" - a pun on its Chinese characters that also reflects its 10th-century status as an independent state - as part of its appeal.翻译:她还提到了大理的绰号“理想王国”——这是一个汉字的双关语，也反映了大理在 10 世纪作为一个独立国家的地位——作为其吸引力的一部分。

Recruitment startup founder Chen Zhengyun, 37, said living in Dali freed him from societal pressure to get married early, as state calls for matrimony grow louder amid China's demographic crisis.翻译:37岁的招聘初创公司创始人陈正云表示，在中国人口危机期间，国家要求结婚的呼声越来越高，住在大理让他摆脱了早婚的社会压力。

"There are some personal topics that you can't bring up elsewhere that you can talk about here," said Chen, adding that the concentration of like-minded young people, social events and tolerance for diverse lifestyles allowed him to explore open relationships.

POLICE OVERSIGHT

The local government has sought to attract young tech talent and in September asked digital nomads for input on policies, two community organisers told Reuters.翻译:两名社区组织者告诉路透社，当地政府一直在寻求吸引年轻科技人才，并于 9 月向数字游牧民征求政策意见。

But the town's population also includes many young people who say they are sceptical of Beijing's attempts to shape their personal lives.翻译:但该镇的居民中也有许多年轻人表示，他们对北京试图塑造他们个人生活的做法持怀疑态度。

A large digital nomad conference with art and tech-related seminars was abruptly cancelled on Nov. 2, a week before its scheduled start, due to "deep consideration of various factors", the organiser, co-working space NCC, wrote on social media.翻译:主办方联合办公空间 NCC 在社交媒体上写道，由于“对各种因素的深入考虑”，一场包含艺术和科技相关研讨会的大型数字游牧者会议于 11 月 2 日突然取消，距离原定开始时间还有一周。 。

NCC declined to elaborate publicly, citing sensitivities.翻译:NCC 以敏感性为由，拒绝公开详细说明。

During a recent visit, Reuters saw a police surveillance camera trained on NCC's main communal area.翻译:在最近的一次访问中，路透社看到警察监控摄像头对准了 NCC 的主要公共区域。

Three people familiar with event organisers in Dali said the November forum - like another conference on decentralised internet technologies planned last year - was cancelled after the government abruptly withdrew funding and support.翻译:三名熟悉大理活动组织者的人士表示，11 月的论坛——就像去年计划的另一场去中心化互联网技术会议一样——在政府突然撤回资金和支持后被取消。

Many digital nomads who use co-working spaces are involved with technologies like blockchain, according to organisers, which they say has drawn scrutiny from local authorities.翻译:组织者称，许多使用联合办公空间的数字游牧者都参与了区块链等技术，他们说这些技术已经引起了地方当局的审查。

Two other co-working spaces were shut down unexpectedly for months, with one also visited by local police earlier this year, according to three people familiar with the matter.翻译:据三名知情人士透露，另外两个联合办公空间意外关闭了几个月，其中一个空间今年早些时候也被当地警方探访过。

China banned cryptocurrency mining and trading in 2021, part of a broader crackdown on the tech sector.翻译:中国于 2021 年禁止加密货币开采和交易，这是对科技行业更广泛打击的一部分。

"We are more low-key and don't emphasise digital nomads in our marketing anymore," one co-working space staffer told Reuters, adding that conservative local governments in rural towns like Dali are "cautious of emerging technologies".翻译:“我们更加低调，不再在营销中强调数字游牧民，”一位联合办公空间工作人员告诉路透社，并补充说大理等农村城镇的保守地方政府“对新兴技术持谨慎态度”。

Such state monitoring efforts do not surprise Ling, the academic. Since digital nomads, unlike university students, "are not subject to structured discipline, they are harder to manage", she said.翻译:这种国家监控的努力并不令学者令感到惊讶。她说，由于数字游牧民与大学生不同，“不受结构化纪律的约束，因此更难管理”。

item.title: 中国希望俄罗斯为中国汽车企业提供政策支持 - 中国官方媒体
item.description:
China hopes Russia will give policy support for Chinese automobile enterprises to produce, sell and operate in Russia, Chinese state media cited China's ambassador to Russia as saying on Friday.翻译:中国官方媒体周五援引中国驻俄罗斯大使的话说，中国希望俄罗斯为中国汽车企业在俄罗斯生产、销售和经营提供政策支持。

China will promote Chinese and Russian integration in the automotive industry supply chain, Ambassador Zhang Hanhui was cited as saying.翻译:张汉晖大使表示，中方将推动中俄汽车产业供应链一体化。

China is also willing to continue to give full play to the supply advantages of China's automobile industry and continue to develop models adapted to the needs of the Russian market, he said.翻译:中方也愿继续发挥中国汽车产业的供给优势，继续开发适应俄罗斯市场需求的车型。

item.title: 亚洲股市受中国拖累走低，美元受挫
item.description:
Asian shares were dragged lower by China on Friday amid little guidance from Wall Street which was closed for a holiday, while the dollar remained on the back foot as investors bet U.S. rates have peaked.翻译:周五，由于华尔街因假期休市而没有给出任何指导，亚洲股市受到中国的拖累，而美元仍处于不利地位，因为投资者押注美国利率已见顶。

The yen was little changed after data showed that Japan's core consumer inflation picked up again in October, although by less than expected, and factory activity shrank for a sixth straight month.翻译:数据显示日本核心消费者通胀 10 月份再次回升（尽管增幅低于预期）且工厂活动连续第 6 个月萎缩，日元几乎没有变化。

MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) eased 0.4% but are headed for a weekly gain of 0.9%. It is up a whopping 7.1% so far in November as investors grew increasingly confident that the U.S. rates have peaked, with discussions shifting to the timing and speed of future rate cuts.翻译:MSCI 日本以外最广泛的亚太股市指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS)下跌 0.4%，但周涨幅将达到 0.9%。由于投资者对美国利率已见顶越来越有信心，讨论转向未来降息的时机和速度，11 月份迄今已上涨 7.1%。

Japan's markets (.N225) returned from a holiday, with Nikkei (.225) climbing 1.0% to charge towards a 33-year high hit on Monday.翻译:日本市场(.N225)从假期中恢复，日经指数(.225)上涨 1.0%，冲向周一触及的 33 年来的高点。

Chinese bluechips (.CSI300) fell 0.3% while Hong Kong's Hang Seng index (.HSI) tumbled 1.3%, reversing the previous day's hefty gains. Chinese developers listed in Hong Kong (.HSMPI) lost 0.7%, after jumping 6.4% on Thursday on more support measures from Beijing to prop up the beleaguered industry.翻译:中国蓝筹股(.CSI300)下跌 0.3%，香港恒生指数(.HSI)下跌 1.3%，扭转了前一交易日的大幅涨幅。在香港上市的中国开发商(.HSMPI)周四下跌 6.4%，下跌 0.7%，原因是北京采取了更多支持措施来支撑陷入困境的行业。

"Since share markets rebounded so quickly, they became technically overbought, so it's quite possible we go through a period of consolidation in markets," said Shane Oliver, chief economist at AMP.翻译:AMP 首席经济学家肖恩·奥利弗 (Shane Oliver) 表示：“由于股市反弹如此之快，技术上已经超买，因此我们很可能会经历一段市场整合期。”

"You get the talk of the so-called Santa rally, but often times Santa rally doesn't really occur in the last two weeks of December. So we could have a couple of weeks with the markets sort of just meandering around and lacking direction."翻译:“人们谈论所谓的圣诞老人集会，但通常圣诞老人集会并不会真正发生在 12 月的最后两周。因此，我们可能会经历几周市场徘徊且缺乏方向的情况。” ”。

Overnight, U.S. markets were closed for the Thanksgiving holiday. In Europe, slightly better than expected euro zone PMIs nudged the euro and shares higher and Sweden's crown dropped as its central bank left rates on hold.翻译:隔夜，美国市场因感恩节假期休市。在欧洲，欧元区采购经理人指数略好于预期，推动欧元和股市走高，瑞典克朗因央行维持利率不变而下跌。

Minutes of the European Central Bank October policy meeting showed euro zone inflation falling as expected, or even a bit faster, but suggested policymakers needed to keep the possibility of an interest rate hike on the table.翻译:欧洲央行10月政策会议纪要显示，欧元区通胀率如预期下降，甚至更快，但暗示政策制定者需要保留加息的可能性。

Cash Treasuries fell a little as they resumed trading in Asia, with two-year Treasury yields up 2 basis points to 4.9338% and benchmark ten-year yields up 4 bps to 4.4568%.翻译:亚洲恢复交易后，现金国债小幅下跌，两年期国债收益率上涨2个基点至4.9338%，基准十年期国债收益率上涨4个基点至4.4568%。

In the currency markets, the dollar < =USD> was on the back foot against its peers at 103.71, nearing a three month low of 103.17.翻译:在货币市场上，美元兑其他货币处于不利地位，为103.71，接近三个月低点103.17。

The sterling perched near a 2-1/2 month top at $1.2575, as strong results from a business survey led markets to push back bets on when the first rate cut from the Bank of England might come.翻译:英镑汇率接近2-1/2个月高点1.2575美元，因商业调查的强劲结果导致市场推迟对英国央行何时首次降息的押注。

Oil prices were mixed after tumbling more than 1% on concerns over the delayed OPEC+ meeting. Brent crude futures were up 0.3% at $81.69 a barrel while U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude fell 0.6% to $76.65 a barrel.翻译:由于对 OPEC+ 会议推迟的担忧，油价暴跌超过 1%，涨跌互现。布伦特原油期货上涨 0.3%，至每桶 81.69 美元，而美国西德克萨斯中质原油期货下跌 0.6%，至每桶 76.65 美元。

Gold prices was flat at $1,992.75 per ounce.翻译:金价持平于每盎司 1,992.75 美元。

Reporting by Stella Qiu. Editing by Sam Holmes翻译:邱斯特拉报道。山姆·霍姆斯编辑

item.title: 市场权衡美国利率前景，美元呈现守势
item.description:
The dollar was restrained on Friday by uncertainty over the path of U.S. interest rates, while the euro held overnight gains as data hinted that the downturn in the euro zone may be easing.翻译:美元周五因美国利率走势的不确定性而受到抑制，而欧元则因数据暗示欧元区的低迷状况可能正在缓解而保持隔夜涨幅。

With U.S. markets closed on Thursday and due for a shorter trading session on Friday for Thanksgiving, currencies are likely to trade narrowly but with some volatility as liquidity is expected to remain thin.翻译:由于美国市场周四休市，周五感恩节交易时段较短，因此货币交易可能会窄幅波动，但由于流动性预计仍将保持稀薄，因此会出现一些波动。

The dollar index , which measures the U.S. currency with six peers, eased 0.029% to 103.73, staying close to the two-and-a-half month low of 103.17 it touched earlier this week.翻译:衡量美元与六种货币的美元指数下跌0.029%至103.73，接近本周早些时候触及的两个半月低点103.17。

The index is down 2.8% for the month, on course for its weakest monthly performance in a year on rising expectations that the Federal Reserve is done raising interest rates and could start cutting rates next year.翻译:该指数本月下跌 2.8%，有望创下一年来最弱的月度表现，原因是人们对美联储结束加息并可能在明年开始降息的预期不断上升。

Markets have dialled back expectations of Fed rate cuts in 2024, with futures now showing a 26% chance that the Fed cuts its target rate at the March 2024 policy meeting, according to CME Group's FedWatch tool. That compares with a 33% chance last week.翻译:市场已经调低了对美联储 2024 年降息的预期，根据芝商所的 FedWatch 工具，期货目前显示美联储在 2024 年 3 月政策会议上下调目标利率的可能性为 26%。相比之下，上周的可能性为 33%。

The euro stood at $1.0904, having risen 0.16% overnight after a series of preliminary surveys showed recession in Germany may be shallower than expected, which offset a downbeat reading of French business activity.翻译:一系列初步调查显示德国经济衰退可能比预期浅，抵消了法国商业活动的悲观预期，欧元兑美元汇率隔夜上涨0.16%，报1.0904美元。

Meanwhile, Japan's core consumer price growth picked up slightly in October, after easing the previous month, reinforcing investors' views that stubborn inflation may push the Bank of Japan (BOJ) to roll back monetary stimulus before long.翻译:与此同时，日本核心消费者价格增速继上月放缓后，10 月份小幅回升，强化了投资者的观点，即顽固的通胀可能会促使日本央行 (BOJ) 不久后收回货币刺激措施。

ING economists said they expect the BOJ to move away from its super-accommodative stance next year.翻译:ING经济学家表示，他们预计日本央行明年将放弃超级宽松立场。

"We believe that the BOJ may scrap the yield curve programme as early as the first quarter of next, as Japanese government bonds appear to have stabilised ... then begin its first rate hike in Q2 2024 if wage growth continues to accelerate next year."翻译:“我们认为，日本央行可能最早在明年第一季度取消收益率曲线计划，因为日本政府债券似乎已经企稳……如果明年工资增长继续加速，那么日本央行可能会在 2024 年第二季度开始首次加息。 ”

The Japanese yen strengthened 0.04% to 149.49 per dollar. The Asian currency has slowly crawled away from the near 33-year low of 151.92 it touched at the start of last week and is up 1.5% for the month.翻译:日元兑美元汇率上涨 0.04%，至 149.49 美元。亚洲货币已从上周初触及的近 33 年低点 151.92 缓慢回升，本月上涨 1.5%。

Japan's factory activity shrank for a sixth straight month in November, while modest growth in the service sector was little changed, a business survey showed on Friday, highlighting the fragility of the economy amid soft demand and inflation翻译:周五的一项商业调查显示，日本11月工厂活动连续第六个月萎缩，而服务业温和增长几乎没有变化，凸显了需求疲软和通胀背景下经济的脆弱性

Sterling was last at $1.2539, up 0.05% on the day. The Australian dollar rose 0.14% to $0.657, while the kiwi rose 0.07% to $0.605.翻译:英镑最新报1.2539美元，当日上涨0.05%。澳元兑美元上涨0.14%至0.657美元，新西​​兰元上涨0.07%至0.605美元。

Cash Treasuries resumed trading in Asia after Japan's holiday on Thursday, with the yield on 10-year Treasury notes up 2.9 basis points at 4.445%.翻译:周四日本假期后，现金国债在亚洲恢复交易，10 年期国债收益率上涨 2.9 个基点至 4.445%。

The yield on the 30-year Treasury bond rose 2.8 basis points to 4.576%.翻译:30年期国债收益率上涨2.8个基点至4.576%。

item.title: 中国称世卫组织询问呼吸道疫情后未发现异常病原体
item.description:
Chinese health authorities have not detected any unusual or novel pathogens and provided the requested data on an increase in respiratory illnesses and reported clusters of pneumonia in children, the World Health Organization (WHO) said on Thursday.翻译:世界卫生组织（WHO）周四表示，中国卫生当局尚未发现任何异常或新型病原体，并提供了所要求的有关呼吸道疾病增加和报告的儿童聚集性肺炎的数据。

The WHO had asked China for more information on Wednesday after groups including the Program for Monitoring Emerging Diseases (ProMED) reported clusters of undiagnosed pneumonia in children in north China.翻译:在包括新发疾病监测计划（ProMED）在内的组织报告中国北方儿童出现聚集性未确诊肺炎后，世界卫生组织周三要求中国提供更多信息。

As per the rule, China responded to the WHO within 24 hours. The WHO had sought epidemiologic and clinical information as well as laboratory results through the International Health Regulations mechanism.翻译:按照规定，中方将在24小时内向世界卫生组织做出回应。世卫组织已通过《国际卫生条例》机制寻求流行病学和临床信息以及实验室结果。

The data suggests the increase is linked to the lifting of COVID-19 restrictions along with the circulation of known pathogens like mycoplasma pneumoniae, a common bacterial infection that typically affects younger children and which has circulated since May.翻译:数据表明，感染人数的增加与 COVID-19 限制的解除以及肺炎支原体等已知病原体的传播有关，肺炎支原体是一种常见的细菌感染，通常影响年幼的儿童，自 5 月份以来一直在传播。

Influenza, respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) and adenovirus have been in circulation since October.翻译:流感、呼吸道合胞病毒（RSV）和腺病毒自十月以来一直在传播。

The agency does not advise against travel and trade as they have been monitoring the situation with authorities.翻译:该机构不建议反对旅行和贸易，因为他们一直在与当局一起监测情况。

No unusual pathogens have been detected in the capital of Beijing and the northeastern province of Liaoning.翻译:首都北京和东北部辽宁省未发现异常病原体。

Chinese authorities from the National Health Commission held a press conference on Nov. 13 to report an increase in incidence of respiratory disease.翻译:11月13日，国家卫健委召开新闻发布会，通报呼吸道疾病发病率上升情况。

Both China and the WHO have faced questions about the transparency of reporting on the earliest COVID-19 cases that emerged in the central Chinese city of Wuhan in late 2019.翻译:中国和世界卫生组织都面临着关于 2019 年底在中国中部城市武汉出现的最早的 COVID-19 病例报告透明度的质疑。

The U.N. health agency had also asked China for further information about trends in the circulation of known pathogens and the burden on healthcare systems. The WHO said it was in contact with clinicians and scientists through its existing technical partnerships and networks in China.翻译:联合国卫生机构还要求中国提供有关已知病原体传播趋势和医疗系统负担的进一步信息。世界卫生组织表示，它正在通过其在中国现有的技术合作伙伴关系和网络与临床医生和科学家保持联系。

WHO China said it was "routine" to request information on increases in respiratory illnesses and reported clusters of pneumonia in children from member states, such as China.翻译:世界卫生组织驻华代表处表示，向中国等成员国索取有关呼吸道疾病增加情况和报告的儿童聚集性肺炎的信息是“例行公事”。

The global agency decided to issue a statement on China to share available information, as it received a number of queries about it from media, WHO China said in an emailed statement.翻译:世界卫生组织驻华代表处在一份电子邮件声明中表示，由于收到媒体的一些询问，该全球机构决定发表一份关于中国的声明，以分享现有信息。

The ProMED alert was based on a report by FTV News in Taiwan that came out on Tuesday.翻译:ProMED 警报是基于台湾 FTV News 周二发布的一篇报道。

Undiagnosed pneumonia was not mentioned at last week's press conference, according to a transcript, but one speaker said everyone felt like there had been an increase in respiratory illnesses this year compared with three years ago.翻译:根据一份文字记录，上周的新闻发布会上没有提到未确诊的肺炎，但一位发言者表示，每个人都觉得今年的呼吸道疾病与三年前相比有所增加。

The speaker said that global monitoring for mycoplasma pneumoniae had been at a low over the past three years and outbreaks were cyclical, occurring every three to seven years.

'SEASONAL SURGE'

The rise in respiratory illnesses comes as China braces for its first full winter season since it had lifted strict COVID-19 restrictions in December. Many other countries saw similar increases in respiratory diseases after easing pandemic measures.翻译:呼吸道疾病的增加正值中国准备迎接自去年 12 月取消严格的 COVID-19 限制以来的第一个完整冬季。在放松大流行措施后，许多其他国家的呼吸道疾病也出现了类似的增加。

"It is just a relatively large seasonal surge, perhaps partly due to chance and partly because there's a bit of 'immunity debt' from the lesser winter surges in the last three years," said Ben Cowling, an epidemiologist at Hong Kong University.翻译:香港大学流行病学家本·考林表示：“这只是一次相对较大的季节性激增，可能部分是偶然，部分是因为过去三年冬季疫情较少，造成了一些‘免疫债’。”

China's National Health Commission did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:中国国家卫生健康委员会没有立即回应置评请求。

On Thursday, it published an interview with the state media agency Xinhua in which it advised parents what to do and mentioned that big hospitals were receiving a large number of patients and waiting times were long. It did not comment on the WHO notice.翻译:周四，它发表了接受官方媒体新华社的采访，其中建议家长该怎么做，并提到大医院接收大量患者，等待时间很长。它没有对世界卫生组织的通知发表评论。

Since mid-October, the WHO said northern China had reported an increase in influenza-like illness compared with the same period in the previous three years.翻译:自10月中旬以来，世界卫生组织表示，与前三年同期相比，中国北方报告的流感样疾病有所增加。

It said China had systems in place to capture information on trends in illness incidence and to report that data to platforms such as the Global Influenza Surveillance and Response System.翻译:报告称，中国已建立系统来获取有关疾病发病率趋势的信息，并将这些数据报告给全球流感监测和应对系统等平台。

In recent days, media in cities such as Xian in the northwest have posted videos of hospitals crowded with parents and children awaiting checks.翻译:最近几天，西北西安等城市的媒体发布了医院挤满家长和孩子等待检查的视频。

Some social media users have posted photos of children doing homework while receiving intravenous drips in hospital.翻译:一些社交媒体用户发布了孩子们在医院接受静脉滴注时做作业的照片。

The WHO said that while it was seeking additional information, it recommended that people in China follow measures to reduce the risk of respiratory illness.翻译:世界卫生组织表示，在寻求更多信息的同时，建议中国民众采取措施降低呼吸道疾病的风险。

Measures included vaccination, keeping distance from sick people, staying at home when ill, getting tested and medical care as needed, wearing masks as appropriate, ensuring good ventilation, and regular hand-washing, it said.翻译:报告称，措施包括接种疫苗、与病人保持距离、生病时待在家里、根据需要接受检测和医疗护理、适当佩戴口罩、确保良好的通风和定期洗手。

Reporting By Deena Beasley in Los Angeles, Andrew Silver in Shanghai, Jennifer Rigby in London and Emma Farge in Geneva, Urvi Dugar in Bengaluru; Editing by Robert Birsel, Miyoung Kim and Josie Kao翻译:洛杉矶的 Deena Beasley、上海的 Andrew Silver、伦敦的 Jennifer Rigby 和日内瓦的 Emma Farge、班加罗尔的 Urvi Dugar 报道；编辑：Robert Birsel、Miyoung Kim 和 Josie Kao

item.title: 科学家警告中国肺炎报告不要按下“大流行恐慌按钮”
item.description:
Leading scientists urged caution over fears of another pandemic on Thursday after the World Health Organization requested more information from China on a rise of respiratory illnesses and pneumonia clusters among children.翻译:周四，在世界卫生组织要求中国提供更多有关儿童呼吸道疾病和肺炎聚集性病例增加的信息后，顶尖科学家敦促人们对再次发生大流行的担忧保持谨慎。

"We have to be careful," said Marion Koopmans, a Dutch virologist who advised the WHO on COVID-19. "We really need more information, particularly diagnostic information."翻译:“我们必须小心，”为世界卫生组织提供有关 COVID-19 问题建议的荷兰病毒学家 Marion Koopmans 说。 “我们确实需要更多信息，特别是诊断信息。”

Concerns were first sparked internationally by an alert published on Tuesday by the monitoring service ProMED, part of the International Society for Infectious Diseases. It called for more information about "undiagnosed pneumonia - China (Beijing, Liaoning)".翻译:国际传染病学会旗下监测服务机构 ProMED 周二发布的警报首先在国际上引发了担忧。它呼吁提供有关“未确诊肺炎-中国（北京、辽宁）”的更多信息。

The standard wording of the alert echoed the first-ever notice about what would become COVID-19, sent on Dec. 30 2019: "Undiagnosed pneumonia - China (Hubei)."翻译:该警报的标准措辞呼应了 2019 年 12 月 30 日发送的关于 COVID-19 的首个通知：“未确诊肺炎 - 中国（湖北）”。

Scientists said the similarity of the two alerts had stirred as yet unfounded worries the surge may be caused by another emerging pathogen that could spark a pandemic. They said based on the information so far, it was more likely to be a rise in other common respiratory infections like flu, as was seen in many parts of the world after COVID lockdowns were lifted. It could also signal a resurgence of COVID itself.翻译:科学家表示，这两个警报的相似性引发了人们毫无根据的担忧，即这种激增可能是由另一种可能引发大流行的新兴病原体引起的。他们表示，根据迄今为止的信息，这更有可能是流感等其他常见呼吸道感染的增加，就像新冠疫情封锁解除后世界许多地区所看到的那样。这也可能预示着新冠疫情本身的卷土重来。

The WHO always requests information from countries when undiagnosed or unknown diseases are reported, which happens fairly regularly. However, it does not always put out a press release about doing so, as it did on Wednesday.翻译:当报告未确诊或未知疾病时，世界卫生组织总是要求各国提供信息，这种情况经常发生。然而，它并不总是像周三那样发布有关这样做的新闻稿。

Brian McCloskey, a public health expert who also advised WHO on the pandemic, said: "What we are seeing is WHO's International Health Regulations system in action", referring to the rules governing how countries work with WHO on potential outbreaks.翻译:公共卫生专家布莱恩·麦克洛斯基(Brian McCloskey)也曾就这一流行病向世卫组织提供建议，他说：“我们看到的是世卫组织的国际卫生条例体系正在发挥作用”，他指的是指导各国如何与世卫组织合作应对潜在疫情的规则。

"I am not going to push the pandemic panic button on the basis of what we know so far, but I will be very keen to see the response to WHO from China and see the WHO’s assessment following that," he said.翻译:他说：“根据目前所知的情况，我不会按下大流行恐慌按钮，但我非常希望看到中国对世卫组织的反应，以及世卫组织随后的评估。”

Both the WHO and China have faced questions over transparency during the early days of COVID. WHO has also since criticised China for withholding data about infections and deaths when it lifted its "zero-COVID" measures, as well as about the origins of the pandemic.翻译:在新冠疫情爆发初期，世界卫生组织和中国都面临着透明度问题。此后，世卫组织还批评中国在取消“零新冠”措施时隐瞒了有关感染和死亡人数以及大流行起源的数据。

China has 24 hours to respond to the WHO under the regulations.翻译:根据规定，中国有24小时的时间向世界卫生组织作出反应。

But some said it was unclear if the illnesses reported were actually undiagnosed. The story which sparked the ProMED alert came from FTV News in Taiwan on Tuesday. In China itself, there has been a lot of recent coverage of a rise in respiratory illnesses, including among children.翻译:但一些人表示，尚不清楚所报告的疾病是否实际上未被确诊。周二，引发 ProMED警报的报道来自台湾 FTV 新闻。在中国，最近有很多报道称，呼吸道疾病（包括儿童）的发病率有所上升。

The authorities there have attributed it to the lifting of COVID-19 restrictions and the circulation of viruses like influenza as well as mycoplasma pneumoniae, a common bacterial infection that typically affects younger children.翻译:当地当局将其归因于取消 COVID-19 限制以及流感和肺炎支原体等病毒的传播，肺炎支原体是一种常见的细菌感染，通常会影响年幼的儿童。

"There is a plausible hypothesis that this could be what we have seen in other parts of the world when restrictions were lifted," said Koopmans, reflecting the views of all of the scientists Reuters contacted.翻译:库普曼斯说：“有一个似乎合理的假设，即解除限制后，这可能是我们在世界其他地区看到的情况。”这反映了路透社联系的所有科学家的观点。

Virologist Tom Peacock from Imperial College London, who has closely tracked the emergence of new coronavirus variants, said there were good tools available to "pretty rapidly" pick up emerging influenza or coronaviruses, so it seemed unlikely that this had happened under the radar.翻译:伦敦帝国理工学院的病毒学家汤姆·皮科克（Tom Peacock）密切跟踪新的冠状病毒变种的出现，他表示，有很好的工具可以“相当迅速”地识别新出现的流感或冠状病毒，因此这种情况似乎不太可能在雷达下发生。

"(I) suspect it may end up being something more mundane or a combination of things - say COVID, flu, RSV - but hopefully we'll know more soon," he said.翻译:“（我）怀疑它最终可能会变得更平常，或者是多种疾病的组合——比如新冠病毒、流感、呼吸道合胞病毒——但希望我们很快就能知道更多，”他说。

Reporting by Jennifer Rigby; editing by Jo Mason and Christina Fincher翻译:詹妮弗·里格比报道；乔·梅森和克里斯蒂娜·芬奇编辑

item.title: 乌拉圭欲加快与中国贸易谈判 南方共同市场向巴拉圭施压
item.description:
Summary:
  • Uruguay wants trade deal between Mercosur, China
  • Mercosur-China deal could pressure Paraguay over Taiwan ties
  • Uruguayan beef disadvantaged by Mercosur tariffs in China
  • Trade deal could reduce meat tariffs by $150 million - study
翻译:概括：
  • 乌拉圭希望南方共同市场与中国达成贸易协议
  • 南方共同市场与中国的协议可能会在台湾关系问题上给巴拉圭带来压力
  • 乌拉圭牛肉因中国南方共同市场关税而处于不利地位
  • 研究称贸易协议可将肉类关税降低1.5亿美元

Uruguayan President Luis Lacalle Pou said he wanted to "accelerate" negotiations over a free trade agreement between Uruguay, China and the Mercosur trade bloc while meeting China's Premier Li Qiang on Thursday, according to Chinese state media.翻译:据中国官方媒体报道，乌拉圭总统路易斯·拉卡列·波乌在周四会见中国总理李强时表示，他希望“加速”乌拉圭、中国和南方共同市场之间自由贸易协定的谈判。

China, the world's second-largest economy, is already a major investor in South America, and has offered tariff-free access to its huge consumer market to four countries.翻译:作为世界第二大经济体的中国已经是南美洲的主要投资者，并向四个国家提供免关税进入其巨大消费市场的机会。

But a free trade agreement (FTA) with Mercosur would be a prize worth pursuing for Beijing as it could pressure Paraguay, the last remaining South American country with ties to Taipei, into reconsidering its links with Taiwan, which China considers part of its territory.翻译:但与南方共同市场达成的自由贸易协定（FTA）将是北京值得追求的目标，因为它可能会迫使巴拉圭这个最后一个与台北有联系的南美国家重新考虑与台湾的关系，中国认为台湾是其领土的一部分。

Lacalle Pou first proposed a FTA with China in 2021 to secure similar opportunities for its exporters as those enjoyed by Chile, Costa Rica, Ecuador and Peru, but faces opposition from fellow Mercosur members Argentina, Brazil and Paraguay who want to settle an FTA with Europe instead.翻译:Lacalle Pou 于 2021 年首次提议与中国签订自由贸易协定，以确保其出口商享有与智利、哥斯达黎加、厄瓜多尔和秘鲁类似的机会，但面临南方共同市场其他成员国阿根廷、巴西和巴拉圭的反对，这些国家希望与欧洲达成自由贸易协定反而。

"Uruguay is firmly committed to close relations with China and active participation in the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI)," Lacalle Pou said, according a readout of the meeting in state media, "and is willing to... accelerate establishing a FTA between Uruguay, Mercosur and China."翻译:据官方媒体报道，拉卡勒·鲍表示：“乌拉圭坚定致力于发展与中国的密切关系，积极参与‘一带一路’倡议，并愿意……加快建立自由贸易协定”乌拉圭、南方共同市场和中国之间。”

China received 27% of Uruguay's exports in 2022, United Nations COMTRADE data shows, while Brazil purchased 17% of its outbound shipments, and Argentina and the United States 6% each.翻译:联合国COMTRADE数据显示，2022年乌拉圭出口的27%来自中国，而巴西则购买了乌拉圭17%的出口货物，阿根廷和美国各占6%。

On Wednesday, China and Uruguay upgraded their bilateral ties to a "comprehensive strategic partnership," elevating Montevideo's ties with Beijing to those of Argentina and Brazil.翻译:周三，中国和乌拉圭将双边关系升级为“全面战略伙伴关系”，蒙得维的亚与北京的关系提升至阿根廷和巴西的水平。

The elevation of ties puts pressure on agriculture-dependent Paraguay, whose main exports include beef and soybeans, and which does not have ties with Beijing.翻译:关系的提升给依赖农业的巴拉圭带来了压力，该国的主要出口产品包括牛肉和大豆，且与北京没有关系。

Li said China and Uruguay should: "take the signing of BRI cooperation documents as an opportunity to promote a continuing increase in bilateral trade."翻译:李克强表示，中乌应“以签署‘一带一路’合作文件为契机，推动双边贸易持续增长。”

Last November, Argentina, Brazil and Paraguay warned Uruguay that they could take "measures" against it if it forged ahead with its plans to unilaterally negotiate an FTA with China.翻译:去年11月，阿根廷、巴西和巴拉圭警告乌拉圭，如果乌拉圭继续推进与中国单方面谈判自由贸易协定的计划，他们可能对其采取“措施”。

The South American country has also applied to join a major trans-pacific free trade pact that China also aspires to join, but both Montevideo and Beijing must overcome significant political hurdles before they can accede to the agreement.翻译:这个南美国家还申请加入一项重要的跨太平洋自由贸易协定，中国也渴望加入该协定，但蒙得维的亚和北京都必须克服重大政治障碍才能加入该协议。

At present, Uruguayan beef, which constituted 67% of the South American country's exports to China in 2022, according to COMTRADE data, is subject to a 12% tariff.翻译:根据 COMTRADE 数据，目前，乌拉圭牛肉将被征收 12% 的关税，该国 2022 年牛肉将占该南美国家对华出口的 67%。

By comparison, other major beef exporters Australia and New Zealand, which have FTAs with China, pay tariffs at 3.3% and 0%.翻译:相比之下，与中国签订自由贸易协定的其他主要牛肉出口国澳大利亚和新西兰的关税分别为3.3%和0%。

Under the Mercosur "Common External Tariff," Chinese exporters must pay tariffs at 9%, should they wish to export to Uruguay.翻译:根据南共市“共同对外关税”，中国出口商如果希望向乌拉圭出口，必须缴纳9%的关税。

Uruguay came close to signing an FTA with the United States in 2006, but its government at the time eventually rejected the deal over fears of expulsion from Mercosur if it did so.翻译:2006年，乌拉圭差点与美国签署自由贸易协定，但当时的政府最终拒绝了该协议，因为担心这样做会被逐出南方共同市场。

According to a study conducted by the National Meat Institute of Uruguay in 2021, if China signs an FTA with Uruguay, the meat industry can implement a 0% preferential tariff, which will reduce tariffs by $150 million.翻译:乌拉圭国家肉类研究所2021年的一项研究显示，如果中国与乌拉圭签署自由贸易协定，肉类行业可以实施0%的优惠关税，这将减少1.5亿美元的关税。

Reporting by Joe Cash; Editing by Bernadette Baum and Sharon Singleton翻译:乔·卡什报道；伯纳黛特·鲍姆和莎朗·辛格尔顿编辑
item.author: Joe Cash

item.title: 中国称菲律宾利用外国势力在南海制造事端
item.description:
Summary:
  • China vows to defend its maritime rights, interests
  • Chinese navy shadowed joint patrol warships - Philippine military chief
  • Philippines has pursued warmer relations with U.S.
翻译:概括：
  • 中国誓言捍卫海洋权益
  • 中国海军跟踪菲律宾联合巡逻舰
  • 菲律宾寻求改善与美国的关系

The Philippines has enlisted "foreign forces" to patrol the South China Sea and has been stirring up trouble, China's military said on Thursday, referring to joint patrols this week by Philippine and U.S. forces.翻译:中国军方周四表示，菲律宾招募“外国军队”在南海巡逻，并不断滋事，指的是菲律宾和美国军队本周的联合巡逻。

The Chinese military will maintain high vigilance, resolutely defend sovereignty and maritime rights and interests, and resolutely safeguard peace and stability in the South China Sea, China's military said.翻译:中国军队将保持高度警惕，坚决捍卫主权和海洋权益，坚决维护南海和平稳定。

"The Philippines enlisted forces out of the region to patrol ... stirred up trouble and engaged in hype, undermining regional peace and stability," the southern theatre command of the Chinese military said.翻译:中国军队南部战区表示，菲律宾派兵出境巡逻……挑衅炒作，破坏地区和平稳定。

Philippine officials have said their military and the U.S. launched joint patrols on Tuesday in waters near Taiwan, a democratically governed island that China claims as its own, raising the possibility of further tensions with China.翻译:菲律宾官员表示，菲律宾军方和美国周二在台湾附近海域进行联合巡逻，中国宣称拥有台湾主权，这增加了与中国进一步紧张关系的可能性。

Relations have soured between China and the Philippines over the South China Sea under Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr as he pivots towards closer ties with the U.S., which supports the Southeast Asian nation in its maritime disputes with China.翻译:在菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯（Ferdinand Marcos Jr）领导下，随着美国支持这个东南亚国家与中国的海事争端，与美国建立更紧密的关系，中国和菲律宾之间的关系在南海问题上恶化。

A Chinese foreign ministry spokesperson said on Wednesday China had warned the U.S. and the Philippines in connection with their patrols.翻译:中国外交部发言人周三表示，中国已就美国和菲律宾的巡逻活动向其发出警告。

"China has made clear its position to the Philippines and the U.S. that the Philippine-U.S. joint patrols must not undermine China's territorial sovereignty and maritime rights and interests," spokesperson Mao Ning said.翻译:毛宁表示，中方已向菲方和美方表明立场，菲美联合巡逻不得损害中国领土主权和海洋权益。

A Chinese navy ship shadowed three U.S. and Philippine warships conducting joint patrols on Thursday, the Philippine armed forces chief, Romeo Brawner, told reporters.翻译:菲律宾武装部队司令罗密欧·布劳纳告诉记者，周四，一艘中国海军舰艇跟踪了正在进行联合巡逻的三艘美国和菲律宾军舰。

The incident occurred at around 10:15 a.m. near the platform of a natural gas field 27 nautical miles off Palawan province, Brawner said. "There was no challenge, no dangerous manoeuvres."翻译:布劳纳说，这起事件发生在上午 10 点 15 分左右，距离巴拉望省 27 海里的一个天然气田平台附近。 “没有任何挑战，没有危险的动作。”

The Philippines achieved its goal of closely operating with its ally, the United States, and there was no untoward incident, Brawner added.翻译:布劳纳补充说，菲律宾实现了与其盟友美国密切合作的目标，没有发生任何不愉快的事件。

The Philippine foreign ministry and the national security adviser's office did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:菲律宾外交部和国家安全顾问办公室没有立即回应置评请求。

Reporting by Ella Cao, Bernard Orr and Liz Lee in Beijing, Neil Jerome Morales in Manila; Editing by Edmund Klamann, Robert Birsel翻译:Ella Cao、Bernard Orr 和 Liz Lee 在北京的报道，Neil Jerome Morales 在马尼拉的报道；编辑：埃德蒙·克拉曼、罗伯特·伯塞尔

item.title: 中国财富管理公司中植宣布破产，负债640亿美元
item.description:
China's Zhongzhi Enterprise Group, a leading wealth manager, told investors it is heavily insolvent with up to $64 billion in liabilities, threatening to reignite concerns that the country's property debt crisis is spilling over into the broader financial sector.翻译:中国领先的财富管理公司中植企业集团告诉投资者，该公司严重资不抵债，负债高达640亿美元，这可能会再次引发人们对中国房地产债务危机蔓延到更广泛的金融领域的担忧。

The firm, which has sizable exposure to China's real estate sector, apologised to its investors in a letter that said it had total liabilities of about 420 billion yuan ($58 billion) to 460 billion yuan ($64 billion).翻译:该公司在中国房地产行业拥有相当大的敞口，在一封信中向投资者道歉，称其总负债约为人民币 4,​​200 亿元（约合 580 亿美元）至 4,600 亿元（约合 640 亿美元）。

The liabilities compared to Zhongzhi's estimated total assets of about 200 billion yuan, according to the letter, which was issued on Wednesday and was seen by Reuters.翻译:路透看到的周三发布的信函称，这些负债与中植估计的总资产约2000亿元人民币相比。

Beijing-based Zhongzhi did not immediately respond to a Reuters request for comment.翻译:总部位于北京的中植没有立即回应路透社的置评请求。

The worsening woes at Zhongzhi, a major player in China's $3 trillion shadow banking sector - roughly the size of the French economy - is set to rekindle worries about contagion, though some analysts expected regulators to step in to stem a wider fallout.翻译:中植银行是中国规模达3万亿美元的影子银行领域的主要参与者，规模相当于法国经济，其日益恶化的困境将重新引发人们对蔓延的担忧，尽管一些分析师预计监管机构将介入以遏制更广泛的影响。

China's highly indebted property sector has been reeling from a liquidity crunch since 2020. Defaults by developers since late 2021 have impeded economic growth and rattled global markets.翻译:自 2020 年以来，中国负债累累的房地产行业一直受到流动性紧缩的影响。自 2021 年底以来开发商的违约已经阻碍了经济增长，并扰乱了全球市场。

Shadow banking-linked wealth managers in China typically operate outside many of the rules governing commercial banks and mainly channel the proceeds of wealth products sold to retail investors to real estate developers and other sectors.

'ENORMOUS' HOLE

Signs of trouble at the Zhongzhi group first came to light in July when Zhongrong International Trust Co, a leading trust company controlled by Zhongzhi, missed payments on dozens of investment products.翻译:中植集团的麻烦迹象在7月份首次暴露出来，当时中植控股的一家领先信托公司中融国际信托公司拖欠了数十种投资产品的付款。

"The hole in its books is enormous," said Xu, who is an investor in a Zhongrong trust product and gave only her surname due to the sensitivity of the matter. "The firm has been in a mess."翻译:“账目上的漏洞是巨大的，”中融信托产品的投资者徐说，由于此事的敏感性，她只透露了自己的姓氏。 “公司已经一片混乱了。”

Zhongzhi, whose business interests span from mining to wealth management, said in the letter that as the group's assets were concentrated in long-term debt and equity investments it was difficult to liquidate them and book the returns.翻译:业务范围从矿业到财富管理的中植在信中表示，由于该集团的资产集中于长期债务和股权投资，因此难以变现并计入收益。

"Initial inspections show that the group is seriously insolvent and has significant continuing operational risks. The resources available for debt repayment in the short term are much lower than the group's overall debt scale," it said.翻译:初步检查显示，该集团严重资不抵债，存在重大持续经营风险，短期内可用于偿还债务的资源远低于集团整体债务规模。

"The Zhongzhi group deeply apologises for the losses caused to investors. We fully understand the urgency, importance and seriousness of resolving this overall risk," the group said in the letter.

HIGH DEFAULT RISKS

Zhongzhi had hired one of the Big Four accounting firms to conduct an audit of the firm, and was seeking strategic investors, its management told investors in a meeting in August, according to a video seen by Reuters at the time.翻译:根据路透社当时看到的一段视频，中植管理层在 8 月份的一次会议上告诉投资者，中植已聘请四大会计师事务所之一对该公司进行审计，并正在寻找战略投资者。

The underlying assets of Zhongrong trust are largely property related, which have high default risks, said Xing Zhaopeng, senior China strategist at ANZ.翻译:澳新银行高级中国策略师邢兆鹏表示，中融信托的基础资产主要与房地产相关，违约风险较高。

"The company cannot get the money back amid the property woes. So there are big discounts to its assets."翻译:“由于房地产陷入困境，该公司无法收回资金。因此其资产出现了大幅折扣。”

Starting off with timber and real estate trades in the 1990s, Zhongzhi quickly expanded into businesses ranging from chipmaking, healthcare, new energy vehicles and finance, according to its website.翻译:据其网站介绍，中植于20世纪90年代从木材和房地产贸易起步，迅速扩展到芯片制造、医疗保健、新能源汽车和金融等领域。

Its financial businesses include trust, asset management, insurance, futures, and wealth management.翻译:金融业务包括信托、资产管理、保险、期货、财富管理等。

Zhongzhi has been selling stakes in some listed companies it controlled over the past few years, and reducing the size of its business, after coming under pressure in the wake of China's crackdown on shadow banking, and the property market downturn.翻译:在中国打击影子银行和房地产市场低迷等压力下，中植过去几年一直在出售其控制的一些上市公司的股份，并缩小业务规模。

"Financial regulators are almost certain to intervene aggressively if there's any sign that Zhongzhi's troubles are spreading," said Christopher Beddor, deputy director of China research at Gavekal Dragonomics.翻译:“如果有任何迹象表明中植的问题正在蔓延，金融监管机构几乎肯定会大力干预，”龙洲经讯中国研究部副主任克里斯托弗·贝多尔(Christopher Beddor)表示。

He added that the trust industry is only about 5% of the total financial system, so problems there are not necessarily life-threatening.翻译:他补充说，信托业仅占整个金融体系的5%左右，因此出现问题并不一定会危及生命。

Beddor said the chance for investors to get full repayment of their investments is minimal. "Officials could certainly make retail investors whole if they want to, but they'd basically be turning their backs on years of attempts to undermine implicit guarantees. I suspect they won't."翻译:贝多尔表示，投资者获得全额投资回报的机会微乎其微。 “如果官员愿意的话，他们当然可以让散户投资者变得完整，但他们基本上会拒绝多年来破坏隐性担保的尝试。我怀疑他们不会。”

($1 = 7.2111 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2111 人民币）

item.title: 阿根廷米雷语气柔和地感谢中国国家主席
item.description:
Argentine President-elect Javier Milei on Wednesday thanked Chinese President Xi Jinping for a letter congratulating him on last Sunday's elections results, a softening of tone from earlier harsh criticism of China's communist leadership.翻译:阿根廷候任总统哈维尔·米莱周三感谢中国国家主席习近平致信祝贺他上周日的选举结果，语气较之前对中国共产党领导层的严厉批评有所缓和。

"I thank President Xi Jinping for the congratulations and good wishes," Milei said on his personal X account.翻译:“感谢习近平主席的祝贺和良好祝愿，”米雷在他的个人X账户上表示。

"I send him my most sincere wishes for the Chinese people's wellbeing," he said, sharing a picture of a letter from Xi translated into Spanish.翻译:“我向他致以对中国人民福祉最诚挚的祝愿，”他说，并分享了一张翻译成西班牙语的习近平一封信的照片。

Campaigning for election, Milei, a radical libertarian, had struck a very different tone, suggesting he would balk at doing business with China because of its government's restrictions on individual freedoms.翻译:激进自由主义者米莱在竞选活动中采取了截然不同的语气，表示由于中国政府对个人自由的限制，他将不愿与中国做生意。

China is Argentina's second-largest trade partner, after Brazil.翻译:中国是阿根廷第二大贸易伙伴，仅次于巴西。

China's Xi said in his congratulatory message to the South American leader that he attaches great importance to the development of China-Argentina relations, Chinese state broadcaster CCTV said.翻译:据中国国家电视台中央电视台报道，中国国家主席习近平在给南美领导人的贺电中表示，他高度重视中阿关系的发展。

"I am ready to work with President-elect Milei to continue the China-Argentina friendship, help the development and revitalisation of our respective countries through win-win cooperation, and promote steady and far-reaching development of China-Argentina relations," Xi said in his message to Milei.翻译:我愿同米莱当选总统一道，续写中阿友谊，通过合作共赢助力各自国家发展振兴，推动中阿关系行稳致远。他在给米莱的留言中说道。

Xi added that both countries are large developing countries and important emerging market countries that have firmly supported each other on issues involving their core interests.翻译:习近平表示，两国都是发展中大国和重要新兴市场国家，在涉及彼此核心利益问题上相互坚定支持。

Milei, who will take office on Dec. 10, will inherit a country in economic crisis, with a triple-digit annual inflation, depleted foreign reserves and a poverty rate that has climbed above 40%.翻译:米雷将于12月10日上任，他将继承一个陷入经济危机的国家，该国年通货膨胀率达三位数，外汇储备枯竭，贫困率已攀升至40%以上。

Milei had also criticized the BRICS group of major emerging economies, which includes China, alongside the South American Mercosur trade bloc and neighbor Brazil, the region's largest economy.翻译:米雷还批评了主要新兴经济体金砖国家集团，其中包括中国、 南美南方共同市场贸易集团和该地区最大经济体邻国巴西。

Since the election, Milei has softened his tone with many he has previously criticized, including his countryman Pope Francis.翻译:自选举以来，米莱对他之前批评过的许多人，包括他的同胞教皇方济各，态度都软化了。

In a separate post on Wednesday, Milei thanked former U.S. President Donald Trump for congratulations from his campaign team and said he hoped to meet soon.翻译:在周三的另一篇帖子中，米雷感谢美国前总统唐纳德·特朗普竞选团队的祝贺，并表示他希望很快会面。

Reporting by Adam Jourdan and Gabriel Araujo, and Liz Lee in Beijing; Writing by Sarah Morland; Editing by Kylie Madry & Simon Cameron-Moore翻译:Adam Jourdan、Gabriel Araujo 和 Liz Lee 在北京的报道；莎拉·莫兰撰写；凯莉·马德里和西蒙·卡梅伦-摩尔编辑

item.title: 日本首相岸田致函中国国家主席习近平 - NHK
item.description:
A Beijing delegation of Komeito, the junior coalition partner of Japan's ruling party, handed a letter from Prime Minister Fumio Kishida for Chinese President Xi Jinping in a meeting with China's top leadership team on Wednesday, NHK reported.翻译:据NHK报道，日本执政党的初级联合伙伴公明党的北京代表团周三在与中国最高领导班子的会晤中，转交了首相岸田文雄致中国国家主席习近平的信函。

The leader of the party, Natsuo Yamaguchi, delivered the letter when he met with Cai Qi, head of the powerful Secretariat of the Communist Party of China (CPC) Central Committee that oversees day-to-day affairs of the CPC, according to the Japanese public broadcaster.翻译:据中共中央政治局报道，中共领导人山口那津夫在会见负责中共日常事务的中共中央书记处书记蔡奇时递交了这封信。日本公共广播公司。

The broadcaster did not say what was in the letter. Komeito representatives and Kishida's office were not available to comment on Thursday, a public holiday in Japan.翻译:该广播公司没有透露信中的内容。周四是日本公众假期，公明党代表和岸田办公室未能发表评论。

Yamaguchi and Cai also agreed to work toward a resumption of dialogue between the CPC and the coalition of the ruling Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) and Komeito, NHK reported. Such talks had been broken off in 2018.翻译:据NHK报道，山口和蔡还同意努力恢复中国共产党与执政的自民党和公明党联盟之间的对话。此类谈判已于 2018 年中断。

The meeting took place as Asia's two largest economies seek to improve ties which have been strained after the neighbours clashed over issues ranging from Japan's release of treated radioactive water into the ocean to maritime territorial claims, China's detention of Japanese citizens, Taiwan and export curbs.翻译:此次会议召开之际，亚洲最大的两个经济体正在寻求改善两国关系。两国关系因日本向海洋排放经过处理的放射性水、海洋领土主张、中国扣押日本公民、台湾问题和出口限制等问题发生冲突而紧张。

item.title: 乌拉圭升级与中国的关系以与南美邻国抗衡
item.description:
Summary:
  • China, Uruguay upgrade ties, sign cooperation documents
  • Uruguay-China relations now match Argentina, Brazil
  • Mercosur membership restricts Uruguay from China deal
  • Uruguay plans to join China-led New Development Bank
翻译:概括：
  • 中乌提升关系并签署合作文件
  • 乌拉圭与中国关系现已与阿根廷、巴西相媲美
  • 南方共同市场成员资格限制乌拉圭参与中国交易
  • 乌拉圭计划加入中国主导的新开发银行

China and Uruguay upgraded their bilateral ties on Wednesday, setting the stage for further trade and investment and elevating the ambitious South American country's relations with Beijing to those of fellow Mercosur members Brazil and Argentina.翻译:中国和乌拉圭周三升级了双边关系，为进一步的贸易和投资奠定了基础，并将这个雄心勃勃的南美国家与北京的关系提升到南方共同市场成员国巴西和阿根廷的水平。

Uruguay is seeking to strike deals abroad that it hopes will be more beneficial to it than a local trade bloc, while China has for years sought closer ties with South America, in large part to secure access to raw materials such as grains and oils.翻译:乌拉圭正在寻求在海外达成比当地贸易集团更有利的协议，而中国多年来一直寻求与南美洲建立更密切的关系，很大程度上是为了确保获得谷物和石油等原材料。

"China is ready to work with Uruguay to take establishing a comprehensive strategic partnership as a new starting point... and enrich cooperation," President Xi Jinping told his Uruguayan counterpart Luis Lacalle Pou at a meeting in Beijing's Great Hall of the People, Chinese state media reported.翻译:习近平主席在北京人民大会堂会见乌拉圭总统拉卡列时表示，“中方愿同乌拉圭一道，以建立全面战略伙伴关系为新起点，丰富合作内容”。官方媒体报道。

China, the world's second-largest economy, is already a major investor in South America and has offered tariff-free access to its huge consumer market to four countries.翻译:作为世界第二大经济体的中国已经是南美洲的主要投资者，并向四个国家提供免关税进入其巨大消费市场的机会。

Lacalle Pou first proposed a free trade agreement (FTA) with China in 2021 to secure similar opportunities for its exporters as those enjoyed by Chile, Costa Rica, Ecuador, and Peru, and to boost exports of raw materials, industrial goods and technology.翻译:Lacalle Pou首次提出在2021年与中国签署自由贸易协定（FTA），以确保其出口商享有与智利、哥斯达黎加、厄瓜多尔和秘鲁类似的机会，并促进原材料、工业品和技术的出口。

But Uruguay faces opposition from other members of the Mercosur bloc who want to settle an FTA with Europe instead.翻译:但乌拉圭面临南方共同市场其他成员国的反对，这些成员国希望与欧洲达成自由贸易协定。

At present, Beijing has no tariff preference for Uruguayan beef, which constituted 67% of the South American country's exports to China in 2022, a market where there is a 12% tariff on the meat, United Nations COMTRADE data shows.翻译:联合国COMTRADE数据显示，目前北京对乌拉圭牛肉没有关税优惠，乌拉圭牛肉占2022年乌拉圭对华出口的67%，而中国市场对乌拉圭牛肉征收12%的关税。

By comparison, other major beef exporters Australia and New Zealand, which have FTAs with China, pay tariffs at 3.3% and 0%.翻译:相比之下，与中国签订自由贸易协定的其他主要牛肉出口国澳大利亚和新西兰的关税分别为3.3%和0%。

Lacalle Pou commented on how China has become Uruguay's main trading partner and told Xi during the meeting about plans to join the Shanghai-headquartered New Development Bank.翻译:拉卡勒·鲍评论了中国如何成为乌拉圭的主要贸易伙伴，并在会见期间向习近平介绍了加入总部位于上海的金砖国家开发银行的计划。

China received 27% of Uruguay's exports in 2022, COMTRADE data shows, while Brazil purchased 17% of its outbound shipments, and Argentina and the United States 6% each.

MERCOSUR

Uruguay cannot easily sign a unilateral FTA with China because it agreed to a 'Common External Tariff' with Mercosur members, not least because the bloc reached agreement in principle on an FTA with Brussels in 2019.翻译:乌拉圭无法轻易与中国签署单边自由贸易协定，因为它与南方共同市场成员国同意“共同对外关税”，尤其是因为该集团于 2019 年与布鲁塞尔就自由贸易协定原则上达成协议。

The South American country has applied to join a major trans-pacific free trade pact that China also aspires to join, but Beijing must overcome major political hurdles before it can accede to the agreement and Montevideo faces the same restraints its Mercosur membership places upon it in negotiations.翻译:这个南美国家已申请加入一项重要的跨太平洋自由贸易协定，中国也渴望加入，但北京必须克服重大政治障碍才能加入该协定，而蒙得维的亚也面临着南方共同市场成员国对其施加的同样限制。谈判。

Uruguay came close to signing an FTA with the United States in 2006, but its government at the time eventually rejected the deal over fears of expulsion from Mercosur if it did so.翻译:2006年，乌拉圭差点与美国签署自由贸易协定，但当时的政府最终拒绝了该协议，因为担心这样做会被逐出南方共同市场。

Under the Mercosur CET, Chinese exporters must pay tariffs at 9%, should they wish to export to Uruguay, which is better than the 12% Uruguayan ranchers face on beef shipped to China.翻译:根据南方共同市场CET，如果中国出口商希望向乌拉圭出口，则必须缴纳9%的关税，这比乌拉圭牧场主向中国出口牛肉所面临的12%关税要好。

According to a study conducted by the National Meat Institute of Uruguay in 2021, if China signs an FTA with Uruguay, the meat industry can implement a 0% preferential tariff, which will reduce tariffs by $150 million.翻译:乌拉圭国家肉类研究所2021年的一项研究显示，如果中国与乌拉圭签署自由贸易协定，肉类行业可以实施0%的优惠关税，这将减少1.5亿美元的关税。

Xi and Lacalle Pou witnessed the signing of cooperation documents across a range of sectors including agriculture, education, and science and technology, as well as over customs inspections, which could be a boon for Uruguay's meat exports.翻译:习近平和拉卡列·普共同见证了农业、教育、科技等领域合作文件的签署以及海关查验，这将有利于乌拉圭肉类出口。

Uruguay is one of the few countries to run a trade surplus with China, which last year doubled to $1.5 billion from $766 million in 2021, data from China's National Bureau of Statistics shows.翻译:中国国家统计局的数据显示，乌拉圭是少数对华贸易顺差的国家之一，贸易顺差从 2021 年的 7.66 亿美元翻了一番，达到 15 亿美元。

The elevation of ties with Uruguay to the level of Brazil and Argentina also pushes the remaining Mercosur member Paraguay further outside China's global trade and investment network.翻译:与乌拉圭的关系提升至巴西和阿根廷的水平，也将南方共同市场的剩余成员巴拉圭进一步排除在中国的全球贸易和投资网络之外。

Agriculture-dependent Paraguay, whose main exports include beef and soybeans, is the last South American nation that has ties with democratically governed Taiwan, which China claims as part of its territory, and not with Beijing.翻译:依赖农业的巴拉圭是最后一个与民主治理的台湾有联系的南美国家，中国声称台湾是其领土的一部分，但与北京没有联系。巴拉圭的主要出口产品包括牛肉和大豆。

Xi said he hoped to build "a model of solidarity and cooperation between countries of different sizes, systems and cultures" with Uruguay, while Lacalle Pou invited him to visit Uruguay next year.翻译:习近平表示，希望与乌拉圭打造“不同规模、不同制度、不同文化国家团结合作的典范”，拉卡列·普邀请他明年访问乌拉圭。

Reporting by Joe Cash and Ryan Woo; Additional reporting by Ella Cao; Editing by Toby Chopra, Raju Gopalakrishnan, Chizu Nomiyama and Alexander Smith翻译:乔·卡什 (Joe Cash) 和瑞安·吴 (Ryan Woo) 报道； Ella Cao 的补充报道；编辑：Toby Chopra、Raju Gopalakrishnan、Chizu Nomiyama 和 Alexander Smith

item.title: 日本政党访问中国以修复紧张关系
item.description:
The junior coalition partner of Japan's ruling Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) has sent a delegation to Beijing to meet with China's top leadership team as Asia's two largest economies seek to improve strained ties.翻译:日本执政党自民党的初级联盟伙伴已派出代表团前往北京与中国最高领导团队会面，亚洲两大经济体寻求改善紧张关系。

A Komeito party delegation led by the leader of the party Natsuo Yamaguchi on Wednesday met with Cai Qi, head of the powerful Secretariat of the Communist Party of China (CPC) Central Committee that oversees day-to-day affairs of the CPC.翻译:周三，由党魁山口那津夫率领的公明党代表团会见了负责中共日常事务的中共中央书记处书记蔡奇。

The ruling parties of both countries should "accurately grasp each other's development and strategic intentions," Chinese state media quoted Cai as telling the Japanese delegation.翻译:中国官方媒体援引蔡对日本代表团的话说，两国执政党应“准确把握对方的发展和战略意图”。

Both sides should work together to promote "positive" and "friendly" mutual understanding, added Cai, also the fifth-ranked member of the CPC's seven-person Politburo Standing Committee, the highest tier of political power in China helmed by President Xi Jinping.翻译:蔡补充道，双方应共同努力促进“积极”和“友好”的相互了解。他也是中国共产党七人政治局常务委员会的第五位成员，这是由习近平主席领导的中国最高政治权力机构。

The visit came on the heels of rare face-to-face talks between Xi and Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida, also LDP's leader, on the sidelines of an Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) summit in the United States last week during which both sides affirmed their strategic relationship.翻译:此次访问之前，习近平上周在美国举行的亚太经合组织（APEC）峰会期间与日本首相、自民党领袖岸田文雄进行了罕见的面对面会谈。肯定了双方的战略关系。

Bilateral ties have become strained after the neighbours clashed over issues from Japan's release of treated radioactive water into the ocean to maritime territorial claims, detention of Japanese citizens, Taiwan and export curbs.翻译:邻国在日本向海洋排放经过处理的放射性水、海洋领土主张、 拘留日本公民、台湾和出口限制等问题上发生冲突后，双边关系变得紧张。

In a survey of Japanese firms with operations in China released on Tuesday, the number of companies planning to expand in the country fell below 30% for the first time in a reflection of the fraught ties.翻译:周二公布的一项针对在中国开展业务的日本企业的调查显示，计划在中国扩张的企业数量首次降至 30% 以下，反映出中日关系的紧张。

Wednesday's meeting also touched on the discharge of the radioactive water. Despite China's repeated protests, Japan started dumping water from its crippled Fukushima nuclear plant in late August, swiftly prompting a Chinese ban on Japanese seafood imports and the postponement of Yamaguchi's visit.翻译:周三的会议还讨论了放射性水的排放问题。尽管中国一再抗议，日本还是于八月下旬开始从受损的福岛核电站倾倒水，迅速促使中国禁止进口日本海鲜，并推迟了山口的访问。

Yamaguchi's two-day visit this week, originally scheduled for end-August, is expected to set the stage for a resumption of dialogue between the LDP-Komeito coalition and the CPC, after both sides broke off talks in 2018.翻译:山口原定于 8 月底进行为期两天的访问，预计将为自民党-公明党联盟与中国共产党在 2018 年中断谈判后恢复对话奠定基础。

Reporting by Ryan Woo; editing by Jason Neely, Alexandra Hudson翻译:瑞恩·吴 (Ryan Woo) 报道；编辑：杰森·尼利、亚历山德拉·哈德森

item.title: 中国航空监管机构负责人与美国大使寻求增加航班
item.description:
The head of China's civil aviation regulator, Song Zhiyong, met with the U.S. Ambassador in Beijing Nicholas Burns, and exchanged views on pushing for a substantial increase in flights between the two countries, the regulator said on Wednesday.翻译:中国民航局局长宋志勇周三会见了美国驻北京大使尼古拉斯·伯恩斯，就推动两国间航班大幅增加交换了意见。

The Civil Aviation Administration of China (CAAC) welcomes U.S. aviation-related enterprises to operate and develop in China, Song said.翻译:宋说，中国民航局欢迎美国航空相关企业来华经营发展。

Back in August, the United States and China said they would approve twice the number of passenger flights currently permitted for air carriers to fly between the two countries.翻译:早在八月，美国和中国就表示，他们将批准两倍于目前允许航空公司在两国之间飞行的客运航班数量。

In his speech at a reception, Song said the two countries should continue the vision that President Xi Jinping and U.S. President Joe Biden laid out in their recent meeting at APEC and create a new situation for China-U.S. civil aviation cooperation in the future.翻译:宋在招待会上致辞时表示，两国要继承习近平主席和拜登在亚太经合组织会议上提出的愿景，开创未来中美民航合作的新局面。

Song and Burns expounded on those talks, saying they both want to strengthen cooperation in various fields of civil aviation between China and the U.S., according to a statement.翻译:声明称，宋和伯恩斯对会谈进行了阐述，表示双方都希望加强中美民航各领域的合作。

"CAAC welcomes American aviation-related enterprises to operate and develop in China and jointly create a better future for the global aviation industry," Song said.翻译:宋说：“中国民航局欢迎美国航空相关企业来华经营发展，共同创造全球航空业更加美好的未来。”

Both want China and the U.S. to further increase flights by a large margin, Song said, as relations between the two countries show signs of thawing after months of tensions over several global issues.翻译:宋说，双方都希望中美两国进一步大幅增加航班，因为在几个全球问题上的紧张局势持续数月后，两国关系出现解冻迹象。

item.title: 中国将碧桂园列入支持建设者名单草案 - 彭博新闻
item.description:
China has placed debt-laden Country Garden Holdings Co (2007.HK) on a draft list of 50 developers eligible for a range of financing support, Bloomberg reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.翻译:彭博社周三援引知情人士的话报道称，中国已将负债累累的碧桂园控股有限公司（2007.HK）列入了一份有资格获得一系列融资支持的 50 家开发商的草案名单中。

Other distressed developers, such as Sino-Ocean Group (3377.HK) and CIFI Holdings (0884.HK) also figure on the list, it added.翻译:报告补充称，其他陷入困境的开发商，如远洋集团（3377.HK）和旭辉控股（0884.HK）也榜上有名。

Mounting problems in the cash-squeezed and indebted property sector, which accounts for a quarter of China's economic activity, have sparked fears of a broader financial crisis and weigh heavily on economic growth and consumer confidence.翻译:占中国经济活动四分之一的现金紧缩和负债累累的房地产行业日益严重的问题引发了人们对更广泛的金融危机的担忧，并严重影响了经济增长和消费者信心。

Authorities are keen that any risks posed by Country Garden's liquidity problems should not spill over to the wider economy, three sources told Reuters this month as talk swirled of various rescue plans.翻译:三名消息人士本月对路透表示，随着各种救援计划的讨论不断，当局希望碧桂园流动性问题带来的任何风险都不会蔓延到更广泛的经济领域。

Country Garden declined to comment. Sino-Ocean and CIFI did not immediately reply to queries from Reuters on Wednesday.翻译:碧桂园拒绝置评。远洋集团和旭辉周三没有立即回复路透社的询问。

Regulators are set to finalise the list and distribute it to banks and other financial institutions within days, Bloomberg said, citing unnamed sources.翻译:彭博社援引未透露姓名的消息人士称，监管机构将在几天内敲定这份清单，并将其分发给银行和其他金融机构。

Once China's biggest private property developer, Country Garden missed a coupon payment in October, triggering default terms.翻译:碧桂园曾经是中国最大的私营房地产开发商，10月份未能支付息票，引发违约条款。

It is unclear what specific measures will be taken to support the developers on the draft list.翻译:目前尚不清楚将采取哪些具体措施来支持草案名单上的开发商。

The latest news shows China's government has drastically turned its attitude towards the property sector, with more active support measures, in a step "positive for the industry," said Ting Meng, a credit analyst at ANZ Bank China.翻译:澳新银行中国信贷分析师孟婷表示，最新消息显示，中国政府已大幅转变对房地产行业的态度，采取了更积极的支持措施，“对房地产行业有利”。

"However, for defaulted developers, any new cash injection will prioritise the delivery of homes, rather than debt repayment," she said, adding that resolving the debt problems would hinge on future restructuring negotiations.翻译:“然而，对于违约开发商来说，任何新的现金注入都将优先考虑交付房屋，而不是偿还债务，”她说，并补充说，债务问题的解决将取决于未来的重组谈判。

The biggest hurdle to a real property recovery is still "the massive number of overdue housing projects in low-tier cities," brokerage Nomura said in a research note on Tuesday.翻译:野村证券周二在一份研究报告中表示，房地产复苏的最大障碍仍然是“低线城市大量逾期住房项目”。

It added that it expected Beijing would eventually "rescue some major troubled developers and fill the vast funding gap for building and delivering those presold homes".翻译:它补充说，预计北京最终将“拯救一些陷入困境的主要开发商，并填补建设和交付这些预售房屋的巨大资金缺口”。

Many Chinese property developers that defaulted on debt over the past two years face challenges finishing housing projects.翻译:许多在过去两年出现债务违约的中国房地产开发商在完成住房项目时面临着挑战。

With nearly $11 billion of offshore bonds and $6 billion of onshore loans, Country Garden said after the default that it would make sure of home delivery and told some creditors it was targeting a rough offshore debt restructuring plan before year end.翻译:拥有近110亿美元的离岸债券和60亿美元的境内贷款，碧桂园在违约后表示，将确保送货上门，并告诉一些债权人，其目标是在年底前制定一项粗略的离岸债务重组计划。

Reporting by Devika Nair in Bengaluru and Xie Yu in Hong Kong; Editing by Kim Coghill and Clarence Fernandez翻译:Devika Nair 在班加罗尔和谢宇在香港的报道；金·科吉尔和克拉伦斯·费尔南德斯编辑

item.title: 独家：中国任命金融资深人士朱先生为新任外汇主管 - 消息人士
item.description:
China is set to appoint Zhu Hexin, a veteran banker and chief of state-run financial conglomerate CITIC Group, as the new head of its foreign exchange regulator, four people familiar with the matter said, amid growing headwinds for the economy and markets.翻译:四位知情人士表示，在经济和市场面临的阻力日益加大的情况下，中国将任命资深银行家、国有金融集团中信集团首席执行官朱鹤新为外汇监管机构新任负责人。

Zhu's appointment to lead the State Administration of Foreign Exchange (SAFE) is expected to be announced as soon as this week, said one of the sources.翻译:一位消息人士称，朱镕基领导国家外汇管理局的任命预计最快将于本周宣布。

Zhu, 55, would also be named a deputy governor of the People's Bank of China (PBOC), which oversees the foreign exchange regulator, said the source.翻译:消息人士称，55 岁的朱还将被任命为中国人民银行 (PBOC) 副行长，负责监管外汇监管机构。

Three sources said that the ruling Chinese Communist Party's so-called central organisation department conducted suitability checks on Zhu last week, a practice followed for all high-profile government appointments in the country.翻译:三名消息人士称，执政的中国共产党所谓的中央组织部上周对朱朱进行了适合性审查，这是该国所有高调政府任命所遵循的做法。

Representatives at the PBOC, SAFE, and CITIC (CITIC.UL) did not immediately respond to Reuters' requests for comment. Reuters was not able to reach the party's central organisation department and Zhu for comment.翻译:中国人民银行、国家外汇管理局和中信银行 (CITIC.UL) 的代表没有立即回应路透社的置评请求。路透社未能联系到中共中央组织部和朱朱置评。

All the sources did not wish to be named as they were not authorised to speak to the media.翻译:所有消息人士均不愿透露姓名，因为他们无权接受媒体采访。

Zhu's appointment as the head of SAFE will come at a time when the world's second-largest economy is struggling to boost growth, fend off risk of financial instability, and stabilise the currency to stem capital outflows.翻译:朱镕基被任命为国家外汇管理局局长之际，正值世界第二大经济体努力提振增长、抵御金融不稳定风险、稳定货币以遏制资本外流。

A severe downturn in the property sector, which accounts for about a quarter of economic activity in China, and a mountain of local government debt also pose major challenges for the banking sector and the broader economy.翻译:占中国经济活动约四分之一的房地产行业严重下滑，加上地方政府债务堆积如山，也给银行业和整体经济带来了重大挑战。

Zhu will take over the forex regulatory head role from Pan Gongsheng, who has held the post since 2016 and who was named the central bank governor in July. Zhu was also a contender for the PBOC governor role, Reuters and other media had reported.翻译:朱将从潘功胜手中接过外汇监管负责人的职务，潘功胜自2016年起担任该职务，并于7月被任命为央行行长。据路透社和其他媒体报道，朱也是中国人民银行行长一职的竞争者。

In a sign of his rising status within the government, Zhu was named an alternate member of the Communist Party's Central Committee, the largest of the party's top decision-making bodies, in 2022.翻译:2022年，朱被任命为共产党中央委员会候补委员，这是共产党最大的最高决策机构，这标志着他在政府中的地位不断上升。

He previously held senior posts at state lenders Bank of Communications (601328.SS) and Bank of China (601988.SS).翻译:他此前曾在国有银行交通银行（601328.SS）和中国银行（601988.SS）担任高级职务。

An engineering graduate from the Shanghai University of Finance and Economics, Zhu has also been a deputy central bank governor, and vice governor of Sichuan province in southwestern China.

FORMIDABLE CHALLENGES

In the near term, Zhu's challenges appear formidable.翻译:短期内，朱的挑战显得十分艰巨。

Chinese government advisers will recommend growth targets for next year ranging from 4.5% to 5.5% to a policymakers' meeting, as Beijing seeks to create jobs and keep long-term development goals on track, Reuters reported on Wednesday.翻译:据路透社周三报道，中国政府顾问将向政策制定者会议推荐明年 4.5% 至 5.5% 的增长目标，因为北京方面寻求创造就业机会并保持长期发展目标步入正轨。

China's yuan has lost nearly 3.5% against the dollar so far this year, but peak pessimism may have passed as the yuan firmed 2% in the past week amid a weak U.S. dollar and persistently strong yuan midpoint fixings .翻译:今年迄今为止，人民币兑美元汇率已下跌近3.5%，但悲观情绪的顶峰可能已经过去，在美元疲软和人民币中间价持续走强的情况下，人民币在过去一周坚挺了2%。

The PBOC, which delivered modest interest rate cuts and has pumped more cash into the economy in recent weeks, is constrained in how much it can ease monetary policy for fear of stoking capital flight and hurting the yuan, analysts have said.翻译:分析师表示，中国央行最近几周小幅降息并向经济注入了更多现金，但由于担心引发资本外逃并损害人民币汇率，其放松货币政策的力度受到限制。

Capital outflows from China rose sharply to $75 billion in September, the biggest monthly figure since 2016, Goldman Sachs' preferred gauge of foreign exchange flows showed, underscoring intensifying depreciation pressure on the yuan.翻译:高盛首选的外汇流动指标显示，9月份中国资本外流大幅增至750亿美元，为2016年以来最大月度数字，突显人民币贬值压力加剧。

China's foreign exchange reserves - the world's largest – fell by $26.47 billion in the first 10 months of this year to $3.1 trillion.翻译:中国的外汇储备位居世界第一，今年前10个月减少了264.7亿美元，至3.1万亿美元。

Last month, Chinese President Xi Jinping made his first known visit to the offices of PBOC and SAFE in Beijing since he became president a decade ago, Reuters reported, citing sources, amid mounting economic challenges.翻译:路透社援引消息人士的话报道，上个月，在经济挑战日益严峻的情况下，中国国家主席习近平自十年前就任国家主席以来首次访问了中国人民银行和国家外汇管理局在北京的办公室。

Zhu will take up his new role against the backdrop of other changes in China's regulatory system this year.翻译:朱先生将在今年中国监管体系发生其他变化的背景下履新。

The changes include setting up of a new national financial regulatory administration replacing the existing banking and insurance watchdog, and the unveiling of a super regulator, Central Financial Commission (CFC), with Premier Li Qiang as its head.翻译:这些变化包括设立一个新的国家金融监管机构，取代现有的银行和保险监管机构，以及设立一个超级监管机构——中央金融委员会（CFC），由李强总理担任主席。

Reporting by Beijing and Hong Kong newsrooms; Editing by Sumeet Chatterjee and Muralikumar Anantharaman翻译:北京和香港新闻编辑室的报道；编辑：Sumeet Chatterjee 和 Muralikumar Anantharaman
